bio: Has the ability to enter people's dreams and find out what they're feeling— and can take others along for the ride.

soultimate.name: Sleepy Gas
soultimate.inspiritEffects: Drops foe's Defense by 40% for 30 seconds.
soultimate.description: Foes' defense is greatly decreased for a time.

skill.effect: Increases amount of HP absorbed by 100%.
skill.name: Grip on You
